fields.headline: Tickets to ride
fields.bodyText: Six top destinations Amsterdam: £66.60 BMI from Heathrow. Must be booked online (£10 supplement if booked by phone). Valid for departures indefinitely. No minimum stay, maximum one year. BMI (flybmi.com, 0870 6070555). Paris: £84.90 British Airways from Birmingham. Must be booked online (£15 supplement if booked by phone). Valid for departures indefinitely. No minimum stay, maximum one year. British Airways (ba.com, 0870 8509850). New York: £213 Kuwait Airways from Heathrow. Valid for departures November 1-December 14. No minimum stay, maximum six months. Trailfinders (020-7938 3939, trailfinders.com). Hong Kong £398 KLM from Manchester via Amsterdam. Must be booked by November 30. Valid for departures January 15-March 17. Minimum stay one Saturday night, maximum one month. Thomas Cook Flights Direct (08701 111111, thomascook.com). Los Angeles: £279 United Airlines from Heathrow. Must be booked by November 23. Valid for departures January 5-February 28. Minimum stay one Saturday night, maximum one month. Quest Worldwide Travel (0870 4423513, questtravel.com). Sydney: £549 Gulf Air from Heathrow via Bahrain. Must be booked by November 30. Valid for departures until December 15. Minimum stay five days, maximum four months. ebookers (0870 8146024, ebookers.com). The pick of the rest Kingston: £399 Air Jamaica from Heathrow. Must be booked by December 10. Valid for departures until December 6, than January 7-March 16. Minimum stay one Saturday night, maximum six months. Airline Warehouse (0870 7707339, airlinewarehouse.com). Auckland: £555 Cathay Pacific from Heathrow via Hong Kong. Must be booked by November 30. Valid for departures March 28-June 15. Minimum stay eight days, maximum one year. Travelbag (0870 8146544, travelbag.co.uk. Alicante/Malaga/ Palma: £64 Monarch Scheduled from Manchester. Must be booked on line by November 23. Valid for departures until September 30. Monarch Scheduled (08700 405040, flymonarch.com). Tenerife (South): £105 Excel Airways charter from Gatwick. Departs December for 11 nights. Excel Airways (0870 1690169, excelairways.com). And the rail alternative Paris, Brussels: £59. Lille: £55 Eurostar from Waterloo or Ashford. Must be booked at least 21 days before departure. No advance booking required for Saturday or Sunday same day returns or trips including a Saturday night stay. Eurostar 08705 186186,eurostar.com). NB Fares can change rapidly. These were available in reasonable quantities at the time of writing, but they can sell out in a sudden rush.
